snippet: Militants from the Nigeria-based Islamic extremist group Boko Haram crossed the border into Niger, setting homes ablaze and killing at least 40 people.
abstract: Nigeria-based Boko Haram militants set several homes ablaze in Niger, killing at least 40 people.
lead_paragraph: Militants from the Nigeria-based Islamic extremist group Boko Haram crossed the border into Niger, setting homes ablaze and killing at least 40 people.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Niger: 40 Killed in Cross-Border Attacks
